subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: With no concrete, rip-roaring issues to take on, North Carolina Coach Roy Williams is content to be the good-natured thorn in the N.C.A.A.’s side.
snippet: With no concrete, rip-roaring issues to take on, North Carolina Coach Roy Williams is content to be the good-natured thorn in the N.C.A.A.’s side.
